org.cougaar.util.annotations
Class Cougaar

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.annotations.Cougaar

public class Cougaar
extends java.lang.Object

Use this class to define COUGAAR-specific annotations. The worker methods for each annotation type should live elsewhere (eg Argument).

Nested Class Summary
static interface Cougaar.Arg
          This annotation should be attached to a public data member to initialize it from an argument element in the society xml.
static interface Cougaar.ArgGroup
          This annotation should be attached to a public data member if it belongs to a collection of members that need to be set as a group.
static interface Cougaar.Execute
          Attaching this kind annotation to a public method will create an IncrementalSubscription through the blackboard service, and cause the annotated method to be invoked for each item in each of the collections of that subscription mentioned in in Cougaar.Execute.on() clause.
static interface Cougaar.ObtainService
          This annotation should be attached to public fields whose value should be assigned to the registered service of the field's type.
static interface Cougaar.Predicate
          Deprecated. 
static interface Cougaar.Query
          Attach this to a public method with at least one argument to run the body of the method on each instance matching a blackboard query that uses the given predicate method.
static interface Cougaar.Resolver
          This annotation should be attached to a public static method of any class that can create an instance given a string.
 
Field Summary
static java.lang.String NO_VALUE
          This is used to indicate that the field should be left as is
static java.lang.String NULL_VALUE
          Can't use 'null' in annotation attributes, so use this instead

Cougaar

Method Detail

getAnnotatedMembers

public static <T extends java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject & java.lang.reflect.Member> void getAnnotatedMembers(java.lang.Class<?> targetClass,
                                                                                                                java.lang.Class<?> endClass,
                                                                                                                java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>> annotationClasses,
                                                                                                                java.lang.Class<T> memberClass,
                                                                                                                java.util.Collection<T> members)
Collect all Members in a given class or any of its super classes which have any of a given set of annotations. Mark each such Member as accessible.

Parameters:
targetClass - the first class in which to look for annotated Members
endClass - the class at which to stop the super walk
annotationClasses - which annotations to look for
members - the members so far. The initial invoker should supply an empty list

getAnnotatedMembers

public static <T extends java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject & java.lang.reflect.Member> java.util.Collection<T> getAnnotatedMembers(java.lang.Class<?> targetClass,
                                                                                                                                   java.lang.Class<?> endClass,
                                                                                                                                   java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>> annotationClasses,
                                                                                                                                   java.lang.Class<T> memberClass)
Collect all fields in a given class or any of its super classes which have any of a given set of annotations. Fields can have any visibility; each will be tagged as accessible.

Parameters:
targetClass - the first class in which to look for annotated fields
endClass - the class at which to stop the super walk
annotationClasses - which annotations to look for

getAnnotatedMembers

public static <T extends java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject & java.lang.reflect.Member> java.util.Collection<T> getAnnotatedMembers(java.lang.Class<?> targetClass,
                                                                                                                                   java.lang.Class<?> endClass,
                                                                                                                                   java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass,
                                                                                                                                   java.lang.Class<T> memberClass)
Collect all fields in a given class or any of its super classes which have a given annotation. Fields can have any visibility; each will be tagged as accessible.

Parameters:
targetClass - the first class in which to look for annotated fields
endClass - the class at which to stop the super walk
annotationClass - which annotation to look for

                                                                               java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> annotationClass)
